name: Trials of Wilderness
description: You are alone on an island, trying desperately to survive amongst the village tribes of savages. To do this you need food, water, and shelter. Hunt animals to gather meat, chop down trees to build a base. However take a few moments to enjoy the beauty of the wilderness and plant crops, breed animals and explore, but don't be to relaxed.
minimum_requirements: OS: windows 7 Processor: 2 GHZ Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6570 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 3 GHZ Memory: 4096 MB RAM Graphics: AMD RX 550 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
